heading: HR01177
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO LOOK INTO THE WIDESPREAD PREVALENCE OF SCHISTOSOMIASIS IN THE COUNTRY AND PRESCRIBE LEGISLATIVE MEASURES TO PREVENT THE DISEASE FROM FURTHER SPREADING AND PROMOTE ITS ELIMINATION
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2017-08-23

FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO LOOK INTO THE WIDESPREAD PREVALENCE OF SCHISTOSOMIASIS IN THE COUNTRY AND PRESCRIBE LEGISLATIVE MEASURES TO PREVENT THE DISEASE FROM FURTHER SPREADING AND PROMOTE ITS ELIMINATION
